When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_TYPES ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_NthCardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:Destroy() end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: if (Object():CountCounters( MTG():MinusOneMinusOneCounters() ) == 0) then EffectDC():Protect_CardPtr(COMPARTMENT_ID_EFFECT_SOURCE) return true else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if EffectSource() ~= nil then EffectDC():Protect_CardPtr(COMPARTMENT_ID_EFFECT_SOURCE) EffectSource():PutIntoPlay( EffectSource():GetOwner() ) end
if EffectSource() ~= nil then EffectSource():AddCounters( MTG():MinusOneMinusOneCounters(), 1 ) end
